entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:45 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:31 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:31 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low minus 5.
